英国政府向乌克兰捐赠价值200万英镑的医疗设备英国政府已向乌克兰捐赠了价值超过 200 万英镑的救生医疗设备，包括呼吸机、泵和监护仪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UK-Government-donates-c2a32-million-worth-of-medical-equipment-to-Ukraine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UK-Government-donates-c2a32-million-worth-of-medical-equipment-to-Ukraine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1751bac8-53e8-49cb-8327-b94c6980c0cf Fri, 05 Apr 2024 13:55:18 -0400 UK Government donates £2 million worth of medical equipment to Ukraine

拜登关于 35 美元胰岛素上限的说法是正确的，但夸大了医疗保险参与者的先前费用近年来，美国的胰岛素成本大幅上涨，一些估计发现，美国人为这种药物支付的费用是其他发达国家的 10 倍左右。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Biden-is-right-about-2435-insulin-cap-but-exaggerates-prior-costs-for-Medicare-enrollees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Biden-is-right-about-2435-insulin-cap-but-exaggerates-prior-costs-for-Medicare-enrollees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d89696f0-6cd3-4090-b87e-aca53668ef08 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 09:04:26 -0400 Biden is right about $35 insulin cap but exaggerates prior costs for Medicare enrollees

更多的孩子死于吸毒过量。儿科医生可以提供更多帮助吗？在马萨诸塞州阿克斯布里奇的三河家庭健康中心，一名金发蓬乱的 17 岁男孩走上了体重秤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/More-kids-are-dying-of-drug-overdoses-Could-pediatricians-do-more-to-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/More-kids-are-dying-of-drug-overdoses-Could-pediatricians-do-more-to-help.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1eceffe6-523c-4546-8244-81f0b0c4a928 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 06:46:07 -0400 More kids are dying of drug overdoses. Could pediatricians do more to help?
饮食选择与拉丁裔先兆子痫发病率较高有关一项新的研究表明，对于怀孕的拉丁裔美国人来说，食物选择可以降低先兆子痫（一种危险的高血压）的风险，并且基于文化食物偏好而不是美国政府基准的饮食更有可能有助于预防这种疾病显示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Dietary-choices-are-linked-to-higher-rates-of-preeclampsia-among-Latinas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Dietary-choices-are-linked-to-higher-rates-of-preeclampsia-among-Latinas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0798daaf-6cec-4216-bdb7-0dac4a991848 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 06:43:30 -0400 Dietary choices are linked to higher rates of preeclampsia among Latinas
新研究发现干扰素-γ释放测定比皮试更有效地预测结核病结核菌素皮试（TST）和干扰素-γ释放测定（IGRA）在预测结核病（TB）中的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/New-study-finds-interferon-ceb3-release-assays-more- effective-than-skin-tests-in-predicting-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/New-study-finds-interferon-ceb3-release-assays-more- effective-than-skin-tests-in-predicting-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f0e92a3-aa48-430d-bbb9-788b4045b665 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 05:57:00 -0400 New study finds interferon-γ release assays more effective than skin tests in predicting tuberculosis
